mapper.select: select c.[CUST_INTRL_ID], c.[DATA_DUMP_DT], c.[CUST_SEQ_ID], c.[FNCL_PRFL_LAST_UPDT_DT], c.[CUST_TYPE_CD], c.[CUST_ADD_DT], c.[TAX_ID], c.[TAX_ID_FRMT_CD], c.[ANNL_INCM_BASE_AM], c.[NET_WRTH_BASE_AM], c.[LQD_NET_WRTH_BASE_AM], c.[EQTY_KNLDG_CD], c.[BND_KNLDG_CD], c.[OPTN_KNLDG_CD], c.[OVRALL_KNLDG_CD], c.[OVRALL_EXP_CD], c.[EQTY_EXP_YR_QT], c.[BND_EXP_YR_QT], c.[OPTN_EXP_YR_QT], c.[ANNL_EQTY_TRD_QT], c.[ANNL_BND_TRD_QT], c.[ANNL_OPTN_TRD_QT], c.[AVG_EQTY_TRD_AM], c.[AVG_BND_TRD_AM], c.[AVG_OPTN_TRD_AM], c.[FIRST_NM], c.[LAST_NM], c.[MIDL_NM], c.[SUFF_NM], c.[TITL_NM], c.[FORM_407_FL], c.[BIRTH_DT], c.[CTZSHP_CNTRY1_CD], c.[CTZSHP_CNTRY2_CD], c.[RES_CNTRY_CD], c.[MPLYR_NM], c.[MPLYR_FINCL_INST_FL], c.[MPLMT_STAT_CD], c.[MRTL_STAT_CD], c.[DPNDT_QT], c.[OCPTN_NM], c.[ORG_NM], c.[AGE_YR_CT], c.[CTZSHP_STAT_CD], c.[WLTH_SRC_DSCR_TX], c.[EMP_FL], c.[SRC_SYS_CD], c.[ORG_LGL_STRUC_CD], c.[PWD_LAST_CHG_DT], c.[ALIAS_NM], c.[FRGN_ASSETS_FL], c.[FULL_NM], c.[MPLYR_INDUS_CD], c.[JOB_TITL_NM], c.[CSTM_1_DT], c.[CSTM_2_DT], c.[CSTM_3_DT], c.[CSTM_1_RL], c.[CSTM_2_RL], c.[CSTM_3_RL], c.[CSTM_1_TX], c.[CSTM_2_TX], c.[CSTM_3_TX], c.[TOT_ACCT_CT], c.[CUST_EFCTV_RISK_NB], c.[CSTM_4_TX], c.[CSTM_5_TX], c.[FNCL_INSTN_ID_TYPE_CD], c.[FNCL_INSTN_ID], c.[INSTN_SEQ_ID], c.[CUST_LIST_RISK_NB], c.[CUST_LIST_SRC_CD], c.[CUST_MATCH_TX], c.[CUST_MATCH_TYPE_CD], c.[CUST_BUS_RISK_NB], c.[CUST_GEO_RISK_NB], c.[CSTM_RISK1_NB], c.[CSTM_RISK2_NB], c.[DMCLD_BRCH_ORG_ID], c.[DAY_TRD_KNLDG_CD], c.[DAY_TRD_EXP_CD], c.[ANNL_INCM_RPTG_AM], c.[NET_WRTH_RPTG_AM], c.[LQD_NET_WRTH_RPTG_AM], c.[PRCSNG_BATCH_NM], c.[JRSDCN_CD], c.[BUS_DMN_LIST_TX], c.[RPTG_CRNCY_CD], c.[MANTAS_CUST_BUS_TYPE_CD], c.[CUST_EFCTV_RISK_FACTR_TX], c.[CUST_CDT_RTNG], c.[CUST_CDT_RTNG_SRC], c.[CUST_CDT_SCORE], c.[CUST_PEER_GRP_INTRL_ID], c.[CUST_STAT_CD], c.[TAXTN_CNTRY_CD], c.[CUST_INDUS_CD], c.[CUST_INC_DT], c.[RGSTN_TYPE_CD], c.[PUBLC_PRIVT_CD], c.[ALT_CUST_ID], c.[INCM_RNG_CD], c.[CUST_GNDR_CD], c.[CUST_NAICS_CD], c.[WLTH_COMP_FL], c.[CMDTY_KNLDG_CD], c.[CMDTY_EXP_YR_QT], c.[AVG_CMDTY_TRD_AM], c.[ANNL_CMDTY_TRD_QT], c.[FRGN_PUBLC_OFFCL_FL], c.[EMP_RLSHP_TYPE_CD], c.[RETRMT_YEAR], c.[MAX_DAILY_ATM_WDRWL_AM], c.[RECALCITRANT_FL], c.[NON_US_CTZN_RES_FL], c.[NON_US_DOC_HOLDER_FL], c.[CERT_LOSS_NATION_FL], c.[CNTRY_OF_BIRTH], c.[CNTRY_OF_INC], c.[FATCA_EXEMPT_CD], c.[GOVT_DOC_FL], c.[THRD_PARTY_CDT_RPT_FL], c.[FRGN_TAX_RPTNG_CERT_FL], c.[EXCEPTED_NFFE_FL], c.[FATCA_ORG_TYPE_CD], c.[GEO_JRSDCN_CD] from [mantas].[CUST] c where c.ALIAS_NM = #{subject}

select c.[CUST_INTRL_ID], c.[DATA_DUMP_DT], c.[CUST_SEQ_ID], c.[FNCL_PRFL_LAST_UPDT_DT], c.[CUST_TYPE_CD], c.[CUST_ADD_DT], c.[TAX_ID], c.[TAX_ID_FRMT_CD], c.[ANNL_INCM_BASE_AM], c.[NET_WRTH_BASE_AM], c.[LQD_NET_WRTH_BASE_AM], c.[EQTY_KNLDG_CD], c.[BND_KNLDG_CD], c.[OPTN_KNLDG_CD], c.[OVRALL_KNLDG_CD], c.[OVRALL_EXP_CD], c.[EQTY_EXP_YR_QT], c.[BND_EXP_YR_QT], c.[OPTN_EXP_YR_QT], c.[ANNL_EQTY_TRD_QT], c.[ANNL_BND_TRD_QT], c.[ANNL_OPTN_TRD_QT], c.[AVG_EQTY_TRD_AM], c.[AVG_BND_TRD_AM], c.[AVG_OPTN_TRD_AM], c.[FIRST_NM], c.[LAST_NM], c.[MIDL_NM], c.[SUFF_NM], c.[TITL_NM], c.[FORM_407_FL], c.[BIRTH_DT], c.[CTZSHP_CNTRY1_CD], c.[CTZSHP_CNTRY2_CD], c.[RES_CNTRY_CD], c.[MPLYR_NM], c.[MPLYR_FINCL_INST_FL], c.[MPLMT_STAT_CD], c.[MRTL_STAT_CD], c.[DPNDT_QT], c.[OCPTN_NM], c.[ORG_NM], c.[AGE_YR_CT], c.[CTZSHP_STAT_CD], c.[WLTH_SRC_DSCR_TX], c.[EMP_FL], c.[SRC_SYS_CD], c.[ORG_LGL_STRUC_CD], c.[PWD_LAST_CHG_DT], c.[ALIAS_NM], c.[FRGN_ASSETS_FL], c.[FULL_NM], c.[MPLYR_INDUS_CD], c.[JOB_TITL_NM], c.[CSTM_1_DT], c.[CSTM_2_DT], c.[CSTM_3_DT], c.[CSTM_1_RL], c.[CSTM_2_RL], c.[CSTM_3_RL], c.[CSTM_1_TX], c.[CSTM_2_TX], c.[CSTM_3_TX], c.[TOT_ACCT_CT], c.[CUST_EFCTV_RISK_NB], c.[CSTM_4_TX], c.[CSTM_5_TX], c.[FNCL_INSTN_ID_TYPE_CD], c.[FNCL_INSTN_ID], c.[INSTN_SEQ_ID], c.[CUST_LIST_RISK_NB], c.[CUST_LIST_SRC_CD], c.[CUST_MATCH_TX], c.[CUST_MATCH_TYPE_CD], c.[CUST_BUS_RISK_NB], c.[CUST_GEO_RISK_NB], c.[CSTM_RISK1_NB], c.[CSTM_RISK2_NB], c.[DMCLD_BRCH_ORG_ID], c.[DAY_TRD_KNLDG_CD], c.[DAY_TRD_EXP_CD], c.[ANNL_INCM_RPTG_AM], c.[NET_WRTH_RPTG_AM], c.[LQD_NET_WRTH_RPTG_AM], c.[PRCSNG_BATCH_NM], c.[JRSDCN_CD], c.[BUS_DMN_LIST_TX], c.[RPTG_CRNCY_CD], c.[MANTAS_CUST_BUS_TYPE_CD], c.[CUST_EFCTV_RISK_FACTR_TX], c.[CUST_CDT_RTNG], c.[CUST_CDT_RTNG_SRC], c.[CUST_CDT_SCORE], c.[CUST_PEER_GRP_INTRL_ID], c.[CUST_STAT_CD], c.[TAXTN_CNTRY_CD], c.[CUST_INDUS_CD], c.[CUST_INC_DT], c.[RGSTN_TYPE_CD], c.[PUBLC_PRIVT_CD], c.[ALT_CUST_ID], c.[INCM_RNG_CD], c.[CUST_GNDR_CD], c.[CUST_NAICS_CD], c.[WLTH_COMP_FL], c.[CMDTY_KNLDG_CD], c.[CMDTY_EXP_YR_QT], c.[AVG_CMDTY_TRD_AM], c.[ANNL_CMDTY_TRD_QT], c.[FRGN_PUBLC_OFFCL_FL], c.[EMP_RLSHP_TYPE_CD], c.[RETRMT_YEAR], c.[MAX_DAILY_ATM_WDRWL_AM], c.[RECALCITRANT_FL], c.[NON_US_CTZN_RES_FL], c.[NON_US_DOC_HOLDER_FL], c.[CERT_LOSS_NATION_FL], c.[CNTRY_OF_BIRTH], c.[CNTRY_OF_INC], c.[FATCA_EXEMPT_CD], c.[GOVT_DOC_FL], c.[THRD_PARTY_CDT_RPT_FL], c.[FRGN_TAX_RPTNG_CERT_FL], c.[EXCEPTED_NFFE_FL], c.[FATCA_ORG_TYPE_CD], c.[GEO_JRSDCN_CD] from [mantas].[CUST] c where c.[CUST_INTRL_ID] = #{customerId}

select ca.*,
ac.ACCT_INTRL_ID ac_ACCT_INTRL_ID,ac.ACCT_TAX_ID ac_ACCT_TAX_ID,ac.ACCT_DSPLY_NM ac_ACCT_DSPLY_NM,
ac.LAST_ACTVY_DT ac_LAST_ACTVY_DT,ac.RGSTN_TYPE_CD ac_RGSTN_TYPE_CD,ac.ACCT_OPEN_DT ac_ACCT_OPEN_DT,ac.DATA_DUMP_DT ac_DATA_DUMP_DT,
ab.ACCT_GROSS_ASSETS_BASE_AM b_ACCT_GROSS_ASSETS_BASE_AM,ab.MNY_MKT_FUND_BAL_AM b_MNY_MKT_FUND_BAL_AM,
ab.MRGN_EQTY_PT b_MRGN_EQTY_PT,ab.BOND_BAL_AM b_BOND_BAL_AM,ab.MFUND_BAL_AM b_MFUND_BAL_AM from alert_info a join [mantas].[CUST_ACCT] ca on ca.CUST_INTRL_ID = a.customer_id join [mantas].[CUST] c on ca.CUST_INTRL_ID = c.CUST_INTRL_ID left join [mantas].[ACCT] ac on ca.ACCT_INTRL_ID = ac.ACCT_INTRL_ID left join [mantas].[ACCT_BAL_POSN_SMRY] ab on ac.ACCT_INTRL_ID = ab.ACCT_INTRL_ID where a.alert_id = #{alertId}
and wt.actor_Id = #{userName}
and a.is_deleted = 0

select c.CUST_INTRL_ID,c.FIRST_NM,c.MIDL_NM,c.LAST_NM,c.CUST_TYPE_CD,c.TAX_ID, d.ADDR_RGN_NM,d.ADDR_CITY_NM,d.ADDR_STATE_CD,d.ADDR_CNTRY_CD from [mantas].[CUST] c left join [mantas].[CUST_ADDR] d on c.CUST_INTRL_ID = d.CUST_INTRL_ID where 1 = 1
and ( convert(varchar,c.CUST_INTRL_ID) = #{search} or c.FIRST_NM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{search}), '%') or c.MIDL_NM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{search}), '%') or c.LAST_NM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{search}), '%') or c.TAXTN_CNTRY_CD like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{search}), '%') )
order by c.CUST_INTRL_ID ASC

select c.CUST_INTRL_ID, c.FIRST_NM, c.MIDL_NM, c.LAST_NM, c.CUST_TYPE_CD, c.TAX_ID, d.ADDR_RGN_NM, d.ADDR_CITY_NM, d.ADDR_STATE_CD, d.ADDR_CNTRY_CD from [mantas].[CUST] c left join [mantas].[CUST_ADDR] d on c.CUST_INTRL_ID = d.CUST_INTRL_ID where 1 = 1
and ( convert(varchar,c.CUST_INTRL_ID) = #{search} or c.FIRST_NM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{search}), '%') or c.MIDL_NM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{search}), '%') or c.LAST_NM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{search}), '%') or c.TAXTN_CNTRY_CD like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{search}), '%') )
order by c.CUST_INTRL_ID ASC

SELECT ca.CUST_INTRL_ID customerId, ca.FULL_NM customerName, ca.CUST_TYPE_CD customerType FROM [mantas].[KDD_REVIEW] kr LEFT JOIN [mantas].[CUST_ACCT] c ON (kr.CNTRY_KEY_ID = c.ACCT_INTRL_ID AND kr.CNTRY_ID = '113000002') JOIN [mantas].[CUST] ca ON(ca.CUST_INTRL_ID = CASE kr.CNTRY_ID WHEN '113000004' THEN kr.CNTRY_KEY_ID WHEN '113000002' THEN c.CUST_INTRL_ID END) LEFT JOIN [mantas].[CUST_ADDR] cad ON(ca.CUST_INTRL_ID = cad.CUST_INTRL_ID) WHERE kr.REVIEW_ID = #{originalId}

SELECT ca.CUST_INTRL_ID id, ca.FULL_NM name, ca.CUST_TYPE_CD type, ca.MANTAS_CUST_BUS_TYPE_CD businessType, ca.TAX_ID taxId, ca.BIRTH_DT birthdate, ca.CTZSHP_CNTRY1_CD citizenship, ca.ORG_LGL_STRUC_CD legalStrucTure, ca.MAX_DAILY_ATM_WDRWL_AM atmDailyLimit, ca.CUST_EFCTV_RISK_NB effective, ca.CUST_EFCTV_RISK_FACTR_TX effectiveMatch, ca.CUST_BUS_RISK_NB business
FROM [mantas].[KDD_REVIEW] kr LEFT JOIN [mantas].[CUST_ACCT] c ON (kr.CNTRY_KEY_ID = c.ACCT_INTRL_ID AND kr.CNTRY_ID = '113000002') JOIN [mantas].[CUST_ARC] ca ON(ca.CUST_INTRL_ID = CASE kr.CNTRY_ID WHEN '113000004' THEN kr.CNTRY_KEY_ID WHEN '113000002' THEN c.CUST_INTRL_ID END) WHERE kr.REVIEW_ID = #{originalId}

SELECT ca.CUST_INTRL_ID customerId, ca.FULL_NM subject, ca.CUST_TYPE_CD customerType, ca.TAX_ID taxId, cad.ADDR_CITY_NM city, cad.ADDR_CNTRY_CD country, cad.ADDR_RGN_NM region,
ca.MAX_DAILY_ATM_WDRWL_AM atmDailyLimit, ca.DATA_DUMP_DT lastUpdate, ca.CUST_TYPE_CD accounttType, cad.ADDR_STATE_CD state FROM
[mantas].[CUST_ACCT] c JOIN [mantas].[CUST] ca ON(ca.CUST_INTRL_ID = c.CUST_INTRL_ID) LEFT JOIN [mantas].[CUST_ADDR] cad ON(ca.CUST_INTRL_ID = cad.CUST_INTRL_ID)
JOIN [mantas].[CUST] ca LEFT JOIN [mantas].[CUST_ADDR] cad ON(ca.CUST_INTRL_ID = cad.CUST_INTRL_ID)
WHERE
c.ACCT_INTRL_ID = #{accountId}
ca.CUST_INTRL_ID = #{customerId}

SELECT ca.CUST_INTRL_ID customerId, ca.FULL_NM customerName, ca.ALIAS_NM alias, ca.CUST_TYPE_CD customerType, ca.TAX_ID taxId, ca.BIRTH_DT birthdate, ca.MRTL_STAT_CD maritalStatus, ca.CTZSHP_STAT_CD citizenshipStatus, ca.CTZSHP_CNTRY1_CD citizenship, ca.FRGN_PUBLC_OFFCL_FL foreignPublicOfficial, ca.MAX_DAILY_ATM_WDRWL_AM atmDailyLimit, ca.MPLYR_NM employee, ca.MPLMT_STAT_CD employeeStatus,
ca.RES_CNTRY_CD residence, ca.CUST_ADD_DT added,
ca.NET_WRTH_BASE_AM estimatedNetworth, ca.ANNL_INCM_BASE_AM estimatedAnnualIncome, ca.LQD_NET_WRTH_BASE_AM estimatedLiquidNetworth,
ca.PUBLC_PRIVT_CD publicPrivate,
ca.CUST_CDT_RTNG creditRating, ca.CUST_CDT_RTNG_SRC creditRatingSource, ca.CUST_CDT_SCORE creditScore FROM [mantas].[CUST] ca WHERE ca.CUST_INTRL_ID = #{customerId}

SELECT ac.ACCT_INTRL_ID accountId, ac.ACCT_DSPLY_NM accountName, ac.ACCT_TYPE1_CD type1, ac.ACCT_TYPE2_CD type2, ac.ACCT_STAT_DT registration, ac.ACCT_TAX_ID taxId, ac.TAX_WTHLD_CD taxCode, ac.ACCT_OPEN_DT openDate, ac.LAST_ACTVY_DT lastActivity, ac.DMCLD_BRCH_CD branch,
ac.RETRMT_ACCT_FL withDraw, ac.US_POA_SIGN_FL poa FROM [mantas].[CUST] cu JOIN [mantas].[CUST_ACCT] ca ON ca.CUST_INTRL_ID = cu.CUST_INTRL_ID JOIN [mantas].[ACCT] ac ON ac.ACCT_INTRL_ID = ca.ACCT_INTRL_ID WHERE cu.CUST_INTRL_ID = #{customerId}

SELECT addr.ADDR_CNTRY_CD country, addr.ADDR_STATE_CD state, addr.ADDR_RGN_NM region, addr.ADDR_CITY_NM city, addr.ADDR_STRT_LINE1_TX description FROM [mantas].[CUST] cu JOIN [mantas].[CUST_ADDR] addr ON addr.CUST_INTRL_ID = cu.CUST_INTRL_ID WHERE cu.CUST_INTRL_ID = #{customerId}

SELECT cu.CUST_EFCTV_RISK_NB effectiveRisk, cu.CUST_BUS_RISK_NB businessRisk, cu.CUST_LIST_RISK_NB watchListRisk, cu.CUST_GEO_RISK_NB geographyRisk
FROM [mantas].[CUST] cu WHERE cu.CUST_INTRL_ID = #{customerId}

SELECT cu.CUST_EFCTV_RISK_NB effectiveRisk, cu.CUST_BUS_RISK_NB businessRisk, cu.CUST_LIST_RISK_NB watchListRisk, cu.CUST_GEO_RISK_NB geographyRisk
FROM [mantas].[CUST] cu WHERE cu.CUST_INTRL_ID = #{customerId}

SELECT cu.CUST_EFCTV_RISK_NB effectiveRisk, cu.CUST_BUS_RISK_NB businessRisk, cu.CUST_LIST_RISK_NB watchListRisk, cu.CUST_GEO_RISK_NB geographyRisk
FROM [mantas].[CUST] cu WHERE cu.CUST_INTRL_ID = #{customerId}
